attributes.additional_details: It should change because it’s causing anxiety for young women who are sexually active and it will cause more issues in the long run if left untreated
attributes.background:
The age of girls becoming sexually active is from 14. The age of cervical tests are very old fashioned and it’s causing women a higher risk of having cervical related illnesses
The percentage of teen pregnancy has increased massively which is also causing higher risk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631905
